name: ShellTun - SSH VPN
description: ShellTun works by connecting through SSH to provide a secure mobile VPN connection that lets you access blocked website and services.  Manual:  https://www.shelltun.com/  Features:  - Premium SSH Servers from multiple countries - Also support for custom server - Secure your connection using SSH - No root needed - Specify alternate proxy servers to send a request through - Use Custom DNS - Buit in SSH client - HTTP Header Payload - Data Compression - Battery saver  Tunnel Types  - HTTP Proxy + SSH - SSH Only - SSL (TLS) Only - HTTP Proxy + SSL (TLS)  Provider Mode:  - Exported config is encrypted - Set custom message for customer  How to use:  >> Import config file created by other users (You can find it in your local group/group chats) or >> Open stealth setting, turn on stealth setting, edit http payload and select one of our server to connect or use your own custom server  - If having any difficulty with the app or crashing issue, send us email first artoftunnel@gmail.com   Rate 5 stars
